flawed_nl_solution:
On his second turn, the ball traveled 180/2=<<180/2=90>>90 yards.
After two turns, the ball had traveled 180+90=<<180+90=270>>270 yards.
Since, after the second turn, the ball was 20 yards past the hole, this means the distance from the starting tee to the hole was 270-20=<<270-20=205>>205 yards.
#### 205

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250, not 205. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
